resources.string: Dog profile picture or ReX logo
%1$s\n\nYour dog is allergic to this food
Symptoms- vomiting and diarrhea, panting, excessive thirst and urination, hyperactivity, abnormal heart rhythm, tremors, seizures and even death
Symptoms- vomiting, diarrhea, decreased coordination, central nervous system depression difficulty breathing, tremors, abnormal blood acidity, coma and even death
Symptoms- brick red mucous membranes, dilated pupils, difficulty breathing, panting, shock
Symptoms- Vomiting and diarrhea, possible obstruction in throat
Symptoms- Contact dermatitis, vomiting, diarrhea, anorexia, allergic reactions
Symptoms- can cause the stomach to bloat, and potentially twist
Symptoms- stomach upset, loose stools or diarrhea
Symptoms- vomiting, breakdown of red blood cells (hemolytic anemia, Heinz body anemia), blood in urine, weakness, high heart rate, panting
Symptoms- prolonged depression, vomiting, in-coordination, sleepiness or excitation, hypersalivation, dilated pupils, low blood pressure, low body temperature, seizure, coma, death (rare)
